snippet.title: Ristorante Amore - Introduction Teaser
snippet.description:
Presenting Cyanide Tea's latest project: Ristorante Amore.

An introduction to the guys: part of the first scene from the prologue. Everything you see here is subject to change. (and not everything is as it seems)

RisAmo is slated to release on March 31/April 1. It will be a free visual novel.

Pre-release favorite character poll: http://poll.fm/3l5ul

http://risamo.cyanide-tea.net
http://cyanide-tea.net
